sentence: By the way, here are the leading GOP candidates: x New #PASen @trafalgar_group #GOP primary #poll (4/11-13) shows very competitive race among top 3 #PApol 22.7% @DrOz 19.7% @DaveMcCormickPA 18.4% @Kathy4Truth 11.2% @CarlaHSands 7.7% @Jeff_Bartos 2.5% @BochettoForPA 0.8% Sean Gale 17.0% Und See Report: https://t.co/H5i2r5w8xB pic.twitter.com/7GiKYFprWj Robert C. Cahaly (@RobertCahaly) April 15, 2022 x New @trafalgar_group #PAGov 22 #GOP Primary #Poll #PApol 21.9% @DougMastriano 18.8% @RepLouBarletta 17.4% @McSwainPA 11.4% @davewhiteforgov 3.5% @HartForPA 3.0% @CormanForPA 1.9% @ZamaforPA 1.6% @VoteJoeGalePA 1.2% @Charlie_Gerow 19.4% Und See Report: https://t.co/lHct4Eh3at pic.twitter.com/nIJ7estztt The Trafalgar Group (@trafalgar_group) April 15, 2022 Speaking of which: Numerous Republicans, including Pennsylvania gubernatorial contender Doug Mastriano, are scheduled to speak at a conference hosted by podcast hosts and QAnon conspiracy theorists Allen and Francine Fosdick.
title: WaPo, "A Democrat in gym shorts tries to rally blue votes in Trump country"
